alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 11 at 3:57AM MDT until April 13 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging from 3 to 5 inches along the Interstate 90 corridor to 6 to 9 inches near and along the Montana border. Most of the snow will fall late tonight through Tuesday evening. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will produce areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Northern Campbell County and Western Crook County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
